title: 2.15 Freedom of contract, Part 3 - The Concept of Taxation
description:
In this episode, we talk about the concept of taxation and how it relates to the role of the government, freedoms and active citizenry.

We also talk a little bit about the latest news and gamification of financial markets.

Topics: dogecoin, trading, short selling, government, leadership, tax, regulations.
